{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Afrit splotch | class = FireDemonSplotch2 | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:FireDemonSplotch1|FireDemonSplotch1]]→FireDemonSplotch2
A small lump of overcooked [[Classes:FireDemon|afrit]] meat, dropped along with [[Classes:FireDemonSplotch1|the rest of the monster]] when it dies. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR FireDemonSplotch2 : [[Classes:FireDemonSplotch1|FireDemonSplotch1]] { States { Spawn: FDMN Q 3 FDMN Q 6 [[A_QueueCorpse]] FDMN Z -1 Stop } }
